casebody.data:
No. 1826. Price v. White,

November Term, 1885.

March 1, 1886. A. S. Tompkins, for appellant. W. T. Gary, contra.

Opinion by

Mr. Justice McIver,

This was an action for foreclosure, and the only issue was as to the payments on the debt. The Circuit Judge (Wallace) heard the testimony, adopted the version of plaintiff, and this court affirmed his judgment.
